name: _UnitComposition
description: Activity to describe composition and decomposition of LoadingUnits

columns.name: _loadingUnit
columns.description: Reference to the LoadingUnit composed in the Unit Composition or referenced in Composing actions

columns.name: _checkActions
columns.description: References to CheckActions performed for the Activity

columns.name: _executionStatus
columns.description: Enum stating the status of the Activity

columns.name: _checks
columns.description: References to the CheckActions performed on the object

columns.name: _compositionActions
columns.description: References to all CompositionActions performed for the UnitComposition

columns.name: _contactPersons
columns.description: References to Actors (Person; NonHumanActor) acting as contacts

columns.name: _servedServices
columns.description: Reference to Services this Activity is executed for

columns.name: _skeletonIndicator
columns.description: Indicator whether a logistics object is a skeleton object

columns.name: _compositionIdentifier
columns.description: Short text holding the process number if necessary

columns.name: _slac
columns.description: Shipper's Load And Count  ( total contained piece count as provided by shipper)
